content:
315 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (viii) LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
including English Language, Mathematics, Geography 
and any two (2) of Literature in English,  
History/Government, French, Biology, Chemistry, any  
Nigerian Language, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic 
Studies, Economics, Integrated Science, Civic 
Education/Social Studies.  
(ix) MAUTY and ABU accept TC II and five (5) relevant 
subjects.  
(x) IMSU accepts 'O' level pass in English Language.  
(xi) BENIN accepts NCE General Mathematics/General 
English in lieu of ‘O’ level Mathematics/English 
Language.  
(xii) LAPAI requires other subjects from the Sciences.  
(xiii) UMYUK requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes which 
must include English Language, Mathematics, 
Geography and any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics, 
Economics, Biology or Agricultural Science.   
(xiv) LASU requires 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics and 
does not accept Physics in lieu of Geography.   
(xv) MAUTY same as in Education Mathematics.  
(xvi) MAIDUGURI accepts 'O' level pass in English 
Language.  
(xvii) EDZAR requires Biology, Chemistry and Physics 
instead of Social Science subjects.   
(xviii) ABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to include  
Geography/Physics, English Language and 
Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects from 
Chemistry, Physics or Biology.  
(xix) CALABAR requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Mathematics and any other 
Social Science subject  
(xx) BAYERO requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include Geography/Physics, English language and any 
other three (3) Social Science subjects. Offers
